name: abrielle crochet mug cozy
sizes_available: fits most coffee mugs - easily adjust the size
notes:
> this pattern is available for [free on my blog][1]. the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern (including all photo tutorials), in one printable file without advertisements.

a crochet mug cozy is a charming, functional accessory that wraps snugly around a mug, adding a layer of insulation to keep your beverage warm while protecting your hands from the heat. 

this coffee mug cozy works up in less than 30 minutes and uses less than 35 yards of yarn. they’re perfect for craft fairs and last minute gifts!

the abrielle mug cozy was our [mini-mystery crochet along][2] project for our fall 2024 mmcal. 

crochet mug cozy is an a crocheted simplicity original design.

join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases, giveaways, sales and testing opportunities: https://www.facebook.com/groups/906744872727855/

you can also find me on etsy (a crocheted simplicity) & love crafts.

all of my patterns are written in standard american terms, unless noted otherwise.

please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds, however, i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions.
